<center>![](https://i.imgur.com/8hFwbMO.png)</center>

Cyclone Servers has been in business since 2013. We take our hosting business seriously and only want to offer our customers the best services possible and to do this we have recently been upgrading our hardware and networking equipment to offer you the best we can.

**Newly updated hardware in Los Angeles and North Carolina locations. (Coming soon to Seattle.)**

Test out our network with these IPs!

NETWORK INFORMATION:

Seattle WA:
Test IPv4: 207.244.151.34

North Carolina:
Test IPv4: 192.198.92.170

Los Angeles:
Test IPv4: 69.12.86.162
 
**Our Features:**

One-click OS Installs with ready templates - CentOS, Debian, Suse, Ubuntu
Custom ISO - Use our available Windows & FreeBSD or bring your own ISO.
One-click CP Install - Available on our VPS Panel, cPanel, Plesk, Webuzo, Webmin,  VestaCP and more!.
Instant Activation* 

Additional IPs - Add up to 5 IPs per VPS at only $2 /Month/VPS

**Check out our KVM VPSes.** 

We do have some promos:
Promo Code: SSDNEW35 Save 35% Off KVM**
 
KVM 1GB | 35 GB SSD + 1 TB Bandwidth |2 Cores | $4.87/mo
KVM 2GB | 45 GB SSD + 2 TB Bandwidth |2 Cores | $5.52/mo
KVM 3GB | 55 GB SSD + 2 TB Bandwidth |3 Cores | $6.17/mo
KVM 4GB | 65 GB SSD + 2 TB Bandwidth |4 Cores | $6.82/mo

Check out the plans here: [Click Here](https://clients.cycloneservers.net/cart.php?gid=6)
 
**Semi-Managed**

We can do most things for you free of charge, without a management plan. Examples panel setup or basic os setup.

DDOS Protection is only available in Los Angeles!

**[Extras]**
Now accepting Credit Cards. (Stripe)
We are willing to create custom plans or upgrade individual specifications (such as disk space) for an additional fee.
We own ALL of our hardware. With our Seattle server being a 64 core server!
Please let us know if you have any questions. You can submit a ticket to reach a sales rep here: [Click Here to Contact Support/Sales](https://clients.cycloneservers.net/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=4)
 
 - Subject to fraud checks *
 - Does not include KVM512 and Under **
